sub_title: Lector/Professor Innovative Entrepreneurship Zuyd Hogeschool (UAS) | Toezichthouder / Commissaris | Auteur | Chief Editor | Spreker | Bestuursadviseur
summary:
Organisatiewetenschapper / praktijkprofessor / toekomstdenker / bestuursadviseur / toezichthouder & commissaris / auteur organizational theory / spreker/ organization designer / design (system) thinker in organizations / PhD- & thesisbegeleider / estheet

Dr. Steven de Groot's research - the research of my research group - is located in Organization Studies, focusing on organizational innovation, strategy & business development and digital business. But also on design thinking & aesthetics in organizations (organizational aesthetics & corporate  artscience), as well as interested in organizational creativity and applied neuroaesthetics.

My (pracademic) research bridges my studies on arts/design, business administration and educational science to arts, aesthetics and design thinking (abduction) in organizational contexts.

Economie Limburg & NL: innovatief, circulair,  en digitaal ondernemen! 

Kenniseconomie, ecosystemen & netwerken, cross-overs, missiegedreven innovatiesystemen, kennis-& innovatieagenda, economisch beleid, Rijnlandse economie & organisaties

Where arts meets organization science (corporate artscience)| Voor artsciocratie: synthese van kunsten & organisatiewetenschap / For artsciocracy: synthesis of arts & organization science. Artsciocratic knowledge production www.pallas.nu
Limburg LEONARDOs: artscience in organizational & societal contexts

Available for visiting professorship on organizational aesthetics, design thinking & creativity in organizational & societal contexts (ArtScience)

Motto's:
- Goed door mooi: production beauty (productieschoonheid) x beauty production (schoonheidsproductie);
- Alles kan zolang je het samen doet; 
- Denk groot, werk klein;
- Succesvol als de mensen succesvol zijn aan wie je leiding geeft;
- Schoonheid van verschil & Neue Kombinationen.
